# Search And Sort Products

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/search-and-sort-products/

## Category
07 Products And Inventory

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
PRODUCTS & INVENTORY
Search & Sort Products

This article covers how to search and sort products in the Products app.

Link copied
Searching products

You can search for products in the Products app using the following information:

Product Name

Brand

SKU Number

Barcode

Link copied
Sorting products

You can sort products in the Products app by category or brand.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
